item.title: 159.225 Assignment1
item.description:
4/14

Update Stake Holder engagement

Stake Engagement contain 3 roles

Champion vs Organizational Management

In Charities project Project Sponsor is Champion.

Sponsor

sponsor has been defined as a system manager form ITpartment

1. Jone Blue form IT Unit
Description: The IT unit faces resistance using different systems after the organizational merger and needs a unified data system.
Role: Champion, Respones for time allocating, Project Initiating and necessary resource providing. 
Interest: Seek a unified system to improve efficiency, reduce redundancy opration in different DB systems and avoid data inconsistence

Organizational Management

OM stands for Organization belief and encourage people to use system

item.title: 159.261 Gaming Programming
item.description:
In this course, we will explore a range of essential topics for implementing computer games including fundamental computer graphics, games software architecture and game physics systems. The course contains a significant practical computer lab component where students are guided through the games development process.

3D is NOT included

item.title: Business Process Modelling with Activity Diagrams and Business Process Model and Notation (BPMN)
Intro to Systems Analysis and Modelling
item.description:
What is System

There are two jobs mainly for system

  • achieve goals
  • MOST IMPORTANTLY add value to existing system

A system generally contain 2 character, user and developer. Developer can get value from user and user needs will accomplished from system

For programmer build a system using code. before writing they need a plan.

SDLC

This is the MAIN concept of modelling requirement and analysis, which is the key part of hole lesson. we will talk deeply in later chapter

item.title: lab3
item.description:
Use-case Description

A user-side function model. not sequense model

Do not internal system components into user-side model. It’s no useful to users

an use action is connected with a straight line

item.title: Overview Java
item.description:
Quiz:

One of the components of a computer is its CPU. What is a CPU and what role does it play in a computer?

Central process Unit, a component of computer, the job of CPU is to excute programs

Explain what is meant by an “asynchronous event.” Give some examples.

event happen at unpredictable time. when CPU needs data in disk, CPU will send signal to disk ask for preparing, disk has releative low speed compare to CPU, so data preparing as an unpredictable event can be seen as asynchronous event.

item.title: Scenarios and Use Cases
item.description:
Use-case

The use-cases symbol on the use case diagram shows what the actor wants to do. Not how that user goal is achieved,

Each Use-cases describe how event triggers actions performed by the system and the user. Everything can be thought of as a response to trigger event. When a trigger event occurs, the system performs the actions defined in the use-case.

Lab2

Tutorial 2: Gathering Requirements for your chosen Case Study (no formal submission needed)
